name: Robin Loot
description:
Description
Help Robin grab all those overpriced artifacts from the museum! Be careful not to overdo it though, as the more you get, the harder it is to move! 

Controls

Movement: Arrow keys to move, up to go to enter doors
Jump: Space
Sneak: Shift
Drop loot: Number keys

Sound Effects
Bfxr

Music

Team
